${ModID}:FlyingSwords.NAME: Flying Swords
${ModID}:FlyingSwords.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice. NL Startup: Gain !M! Plated Armor.

${ModID}:GeoDaRay.NAME: Geo Da Ray
${ModID}:GeoDaRay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Gain !M! ${ModID}:Windrush and ${ModID}:Precision for each.

${ModID}:Overpressure.NAME: Overpressure
${ModID}:Overpressure.FLAVOR: So... you dare to defy me?!

${ModID}:Airdrop.NAME: Airdrop
${ModID}:Airdrop.DESCRIPTION: Discover an Attack. If it’s Common, heal !M! HP. If it’s Rare, take 3 damage.

${ModID}:TempestOfStrikes.NAME: Tempest of Strikes
${ModID}:TempestOfStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${ModID}:Bind for each Attack in your deck. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FallOver.NAME: Fall Over
${ModID}:FallOver.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength. NL If the enemy dies, apply !M! ${ModID}:Bind to a random enemy and Exhaust.
${ModID}:FallOver.FLAVOR: Stay still... and let me slay you!

${ModID}:FeedingWinds.NAME: Feeding Winds
${ModID}:FeedingWinds.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 ${ModID}:Windrush per Attack in your hand. NL Startup: ${ModID}:Modify !M! random Attacks: "Gain 1 Strength"
${ModID}:FeedingWinds.FLAVOR: Let's see just how strong I am!

${ModID}:EscalatingBreeze.NAME: Escalating Breeze
${ModID}:EscalatingBreeze.DESCRIPTION: At the end of this turn, Retain up to !M! attacks and reduce their cost by !${ModID}:m2! next turn.

${ModID}:GaleForce.NAME: Gale-Force
${ModID}:GaleForce.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, gain ${ModID}:Windrush equal to its cost +!M!, and draw a card if it costs !${ModID}:m2! or more.

${ModID}:DownwindBlow.NAME: Downwind Blow
${ModID}:DownwindBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! ${ModID}:Precision. Take !${ModID}:m2!% less attack damage this turn.
